code: const englishRiddles=[["Guess The Word","maple"],["Guess the color","Green"],["Guess the car","mitsubishi"],["Guess the fruit","watermelon"],["Guess the problem","low power"]];const hebrewRiddles=[["שריפה משני תווים","מדורה"],["בלה בלה","בלה בלה"]];export function getRandomEnglishRiddle(){const randomIndex=Math.floor(Math.random()*englishRiddles.length);const[definition,solution]=englishRiddles[randomIndex];return{definition:definition,solution:solution.toUpperCase().split("")};}export function getRandomHebrewRiddle(){const randomIndex=Math.floor(Math.random()*hebrewRiddles.length);let[definition,solution]=hebrewRiddles[randomIndex];solution=solution.split("").reverse();console.log("solution is",solution);return{definition:definition,solution:solution};}
